WorkItem.Description:
Having followed :
 http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa390423(v=vs.85).aspx
 
I have managed to query the Windows network routing table by querying Win32_IP4RouteTable. The problem comes when I get to the InstallDate field. I have searched a great deal of documentation and web sites looking for how to read the value of this field by using 
  IWbemClassObject::Get() 
to return a variant value for this field but none of the values within the resulting VARIANT type is meaningful.
 
Can you please provide a sample which makes this date time useful? An additional example of how to set it properly as well would be useful as I'm writing a RIP daemon (yes, I know, it's educational so I'll better understand the protocol)
